prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with striking green and pink colors and large wings.
I want an insectoid Pokemon that has a predatory look and vibrant features.
Generate a Pokemon with a sleek body shape and a mix of green and pink accents.
Make a Pokemon that embodies speed and agility, showcasing beautiful wing patterns.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forests with a unique color palette of green and pink.
Design a Pokemon known for its swift movements and dazzling wings.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of both bug and flying types with vivid colors.

distinctive_features: Distinctive green coloration with pink accents
